block.p: MARCH-Myrna. On September 8, 1997. Beloved wife of Dr. Arnold Roufa, devoted sister of Wendy Rue, NY, and Maxwell Goldhar, Toronto. Devoted stepmother of Karen Caparelli, Michael Roufa and Rachel Bennett, loving grandmother of Crystal Anne Bennett. Services on Wednesday, 12:15 PM, at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue. In lieu of flowers the family requests memorial contributions be made to the American Cancer Society.
